title: The Technique of artificial pneumothorax
brief_description: Apparatus used in the operation of applying artificial pneumothorax treatment in pulmonary tuberculosis (controlled collapse of the infected lung). Shows the induction in the lung wall; the refill in the lung wall; explains the treatment necessary to effect a complete cure.
